name: Jevil spin
description:
Hi!

This is a program where it creates five windows and makes the for windows spin around it. You can set the speed and there are two rotations. This is just a fun little thing that I make because you don't really see things like this that much. To use this program you need Java installed to your computer.

Thank you and please support me.

Credits

Jevil is a character from Deltarune and Deltarune is a game made by Toby Fox.
